=== About Me ===
I'm a relatively young Ubuntu user and have been active in Ubuntu/Linux since 2008.

I also go by 'linuxdude', on Launchpad.

==== Contributions to Ubuntu ====
 {*} Ubuntu Forums ~ Ubuntu Forums Staff Emeritus <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/member.php?u=739457|ubudog]]</nowiki>.

==== Hobbies ====
I am an Ubuntu Forums member and tend to lurk in the Absolute Begginer and General Help sections.  I enjoy helping newcomers get used to Ubuntu/Linux and I tend to learn something new myself.
